item.title: Greybox: An Open Source Smart Contract Security Scanner
item.description: An open-source smart contract security scanner combining static and dynamic analysis.

item.title: CVE-2020-7693: Unauthenticated Denial of Service (DoS) in SockJS <0.3.20 Node apps
item.description: An unauthenticated denial of service (DoS) vulnerability in SockJS <0.3.20 Node apps.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m a security researcher from Australia. Curious about building a safer digital world for all. Authored CVE-2020-7693. Top 500 ranked security researcher at Bugcrowd back in 2021 OSCP & OSWA certified Let’s connect Security Assessments: /consulting Email: public@sussition.com

item.title: Consulting
item.description: I offer flexible security consulting and penetration testing services. My speciality is on web applications. In the past, I’ve had the opportunity to test a variety of the world’s fastest growing organisations, from startups to large fintechs. If you’re interested, let’s chat at: consulting@sussition.com
